author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Currently we regularly only test on a subset of our supported platforms.  Need to run all tests on all supported platforms.  We should also be testing against the built package and not just binaries built from a clone of the repo.  Same tests should be used by our publishing pipeline.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: What is test environment used in .Net Core repos? It seems they have full set of test platforms.

title: Need automated tests run for all supported platforms including badge report out
